name: Ace Combat 7 Concept UI
description: I love playing Ace Combat. I've playing the series since the 4th iconic one came out on PS2. The music and storytelling was always on point. The one thing that disappoints me about the game, however, is the UI has mostly remained the same, clunky and in-the-way. I explored, "what if they utilized the entire screen real estate and modernized the UI a lot more.
